game.name: Dangerous Water
game.description:
This princess is very cute and pretty excited to go on her new adventurous journey. Although she looks confident all the time when she leaves her home, this time the cute lady needs your help to complete his journey. Since you are her good friend so you have decided to come forward and show your helping hand. Are you ready to accept this challenge friends? Join Dangerous Water game and get ready to help the princess who wants to get back to her castle at the end!

Remember, the platform is full of many obstacles, so, it’s your responsibility to assist her make a proper jump at the right time and run over the track in this free online platform game. We are sure that you are going to have amazing fun while deciding to play with this cute and little character whose life motto is to smile all the time. This little girl has a huge hope from you, so don’t let her down. Click the mouse while playing it in your PC or tap the screen when you are enjoying this HTML5 game in your mobile or tablet!

Your winning will depend on the use of your brain and puzzle solving skill. Face every challenge with a brave heart to go through it! It’s time to show the world that you are also an adventure freak. Help the girl to reach her destination to bring a big smile on her face! Good luck to try out more puzzle arcades on our free online game website! We are sure that you will have great fun all the time when you browse through our classic adventure games for boys.
